DataElement.preferredName: Last Dose Additional Prior Therapy Administered Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response used to determine the date on which the final dose of an additional prior therapeutic agent(s) that produced an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process was administered.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Last Dose Additional Prior Therapy Administered
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining._A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time._Added; extra; further._An indicator that a person has been previously treated for the same condition or with the same therapy._The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.:The amount of medicine taken, or radiation given, at one time.

Concepts.definition: Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.
A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.

Property.preferredDefinition: Added; extra; further.:An indicator that a person has been previously treated for the same condition or with the same therapy.:The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

Concepts.definition: Prior action or administration of therapeutic agents that produced an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

DataElementConcept.origin: ECOG CRF:Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/3/17 tt added Diagnosis CSI. 6/20/17 jk transferred to NCI Standards per confirmation by Brian Campbell as part of Round 5 finalization task, added reg status.
